hero.title: Bridge the Gap Between Campus and Career
hero.subtitle: AI is automating the work that once trained the next generation. Street2Ivy connects ambitious students with corporate project teams ‚Äî giving talent real experience and giving companies a low-risk pipeline to the best minds on any campus.

items.title: For Students:
items.description: Go beyond the classroom. Build a portfolio of real corporate projects that proves you can do the work AI can't.

items.title: For Companies:
items.description: Access motivated, pre-vetted talent for scoped projects ‚Äî no headcount commitment, no intern program overhead, just results.

items.title: For Universities:
items.description: Boost graduate placement rates and career readiness without building new infrastructure. Plug your students into real opportunities.

items.title: Post Your Project
items.description: Describe your project needs and requirements. Our team will help match you with the right talent.

items.title: Review Applications
items.description: Browse qualified candidates, review portfolios, and select the perfect match for your project.

items.title: Collaborate & Succeed
items.description: We facilitate the introduction and handoff. All project work happens through the company's own tools — your workflow, your way.

items.quote: We needed a competitive analysis done fast, and hiring a consultant would have cost 10x more. The student we worked with delivered insights our strategy team is still referencing six months later.
items.author: Michael Chen
items.role: VP of Strategy, Growth Ventures LLC

items.quote: I go to a state school nobody's heard of. Before Street2Ivy, I couldn't even get interviews. Now I have three completed projects on my resume and a standing offer from a Series B startup.
items.author: Jasmine Rodriguez

items.quote: The best part? We didn't have to put any proprietary data on a third-party platform. Students worked in our Slack and Google Drive just like our regular team.
items.author: Sarah Kim

items.quote: We've hired three full-time employees from Street2Ivy projects. It's become our primary talent pipeline for early-career hires.
items.author: Emily Thompson

items.quote: As a first-generation college student, I never had a network. Street2Ivy gave me access to real corporate work that built my reputation on merit, not connections.
items.author: David Park

items.quote: Our career services team can't be available 24/7, but the AI coaching can. It's transformed how our students prepare for interviews and build their professional brand.
items.author: Dr. Lisa Anderson
items.role: Dean of Career Services, Metro State University

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of students and companies already using Street2Ivy to create meaningful connections.
